responsibilities: Design and contribute to the integrated search platform to support ML workloads.
Participate in product and architecture discussions.
Perform code reviews with peers and make recommendations to improve code and software development processes.
Collaborate with other teams including cloud services, database, enterprise tools, drivers, and support to coordinate changes or contribute to their projects.
qualifications: Proficiency in modern programming languages and techniques, preferably Java and Python.
Experience in developing distributed systems, cloud services, and SaaS products.
Ability to build Gen AI applications or tools like langchain, llama index (preferred but not required).
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on designing and contributing to an integrated search platform to support ML workloads, participating in product and architecture discussions, performing code reviews, and collaborating with other teams. These responsibilities do not explicitly mention working with Generative AI or language models.

However, the skills section provides a crucial insight. It mentions the "Ability to build Gen AI applications or tools like langchain, llama index (preferred but not required)." This indicates that while it may not be a primary responsibility, there is an expectation or preference for the candidate to have the ability to work with Generative AI applications or tools related to language models. This suggests that the job does involve some level of interaction with Generative AI or language models, even if it is not the central focus.

Therefore, based on the skills section, it can be inferred that the job does involve working with Generative AI or language models.
